name: BeatBox (Rilantes)
description:
A 2D black and white platformer made for Black and White Jam #8. Run, jump, and dash your way through looping levels as DJ.EXE and finish before your ghost does to win! 

Strongly recommended to play with a controller. Windows executable also runs smoother than playing in browser.

Music sourced from Epidemic Sound. Thanks to Tarodev for the 2D Character Controller script.
